Class HATJoint: Hybrid Autoregressive Transducer Joint Network. It combines encoder and prediction network outputs via feedforward joint network, applies activation, optional dropout, produces logits over vocabulary plus blank token. Supports log_softmax, memory preservation, and fused loss and WER computation for efficiency. Provides methods to set loss and wer, and to compute joint outputs, possibly in sub-batches.

Business intent: Provide a neural network component for speech recognition models (RNN-T/HAT) that computes joint probabilities, supports memory-efficient fused loss and WER calculation, facilitating training and inference.
